name: The Orange Man
description: You have been tasked with the interrogation of an orange man who has appeared in Port Barlow. You just want to get rid of him and close the file so you can get some sleep, except… old memories begin to surface as soon as you meet him. The more time you spend with the orange man, the more clearly you remember an event from your childhood. He takes you in circles, forcing you to confront the one thing that you’ve never been able to forgive yourself for. You need to get to the bottom of this.
